alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 16 at 5:18AM EST until December 18 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The heaviest lake effect snow is expected to be across southern and eastern suburbs of Buffalo and southwest Genesee County. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4285 7833 4303 7817 4310 7840 4307 7862 4299 7895 4279 7890 4251 7942 4248 7937 4264 7872 4276 7855 TIME Y22M12D17T0000Z-Y22M12D17T1200Z COORD...4293 7828 4304 7829 4305 7856 4297 7895 4281 7890 4260 7926 4261 7908 4268 7883 4282 7851 4285 7834 TIME Y22M12D17T1200Z-Y22M12D17T1800Z COORD...4298 7830 4306 7829 4310 7845 4308 7873 4303 7889 4309 7903 4300 7905 4283 7889 4266 7916 4279 7869 TIME Y22M12D17T1800Z-Y22M12D18T0000Z COORD...4276 7834 4291 7831 4296 7837 4297 7872 4294 7891 4279 7890 4253 7939 4257 7911 4258 7876 4270 7856 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4267 7847 4273 7841 4281 7839 4283 7886 4239 7962 4237 7959 4256 7900 4254 7900 4254 7879 4256 7879 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1200Z COORD...4250 7830 4262 7798 4284 7818 4285 7859 4277 7895 4232 7975 4199 7977 4222 7908 4226 7854 4237 7831 TIME Y22M12D18T1200Z-Y22M12D19T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
